itemDescription: English first-class cricketer and British Army officer (1836-1874)

wikipedia_page.main: William Wrey Hartopp (22 April 1836 – 20 July 1874) was an English first-class cricketer and British Army officer.

link_mentions.page: List of Old Etonians born in the 19th century

response: He died 31 December 1884 at his residence at 21 Thurloe Square in London. His son, William Hartopp, was a first-class cricketer.
His brothers, George and William, also played first-class cricket, as did his brother-in-law William Hartopp.
